page.title: 04Education. School girl
page.content: My name is Mandy there is mum,dad, Sarah and Jamie.My dad starts the day waking up for early shifts at I.C.I., Avonmouth.He works in the security office.My sister wakes up at 06:00 & makes her bed,gets dressed and has her breakfast.Then,at 07:30-08:00,the rest of us go downstairs and have breakfast. Me and my mum get dressed.My mum gets my brother dressed.I go to school and my mum does the the house-work.When I come home we have tea.My dad comes home at about 17:00 for tea. We wash up and afterwards watch television.I go to bed and so does my brother.My sister goes to bed at 22:00 My mum and dad go to bed at 23:30.
